values.value: This is an description for quote email template two. Used in HRCSVC_BatchToSendServiceEstimate Developed for #SE-46

This is a follow up on the service estimate that was previously sent to you. Attached is a service estimate for serial number {#AssetSerialNumber} based on our service engineer’s recent inspection. This estimate does not include taxes which will be determined based on the locality where the work is performed. In order to keep your equipment maintained in accordance with the manufacturer’s specifications, please provide us with a Purchase Order Number to allow us to proceed with the repair. This estimate is valid for 60 days from the date shown on the estimate.
Regards, Hillrom Service
